About Me

Owais Hafiz Muhammad

System Lead with 8+ years proven success leading end-to-end development of vehicle functions for ADAS and autonomous driving systems across major automotive brands. Expert in defining and executing function roadmaps, ensuring alignment with global vehicle programs, quality standards (ISO 26262, ASPICE), and production readiness.

My Career

Software Project Lead @ CARIAD SE (Volkswagen Group)

System Architect Interior Cabin Monitoring System: • Led development and deployment of interior perception systems for driver and occupant monitoring across VW Group platforms • Defined perception architecture and roadmaps, integrating deep learning models for gaze tracking, occupant classification • Designed end-to-end pipelines for sensor data processing and neural network inference • Architected scalable middleware for cross-platform deployment System Lead – Multi-Function Camera System: • Led end-to-end development of intelligent Multi-Function Camera system • Owned cross-domain system release coordination • Managed milestone delivery aligned with BMG/DET targets

Aug 2022 - Present
Senior System Lead ADAS/HAD Solutions

Project Lead @ Mobility Asia (CARIAD CN)

• Program Management - Led ECU development programs, managing SW/HW release cycles • Requirements Engineering - Defined system requirements for ADAS Domain Controllers • Hardware Development - Directed ECU hardware interfaces and design reviews • Software Development - Oversaw AUTOSAR CP/AP base software development • Testing & Integration - Managed validation activities and supplier test campaigns

Jan 2021 - Jul 2022
Project Lead ADAP Computation Architecture

System Development Engineer @ VCIC (Audi/VW Group)

• Defined system and ECU-level requirements for Top View and Advanced Parking features • Coordinated stakeholder inputs across system architecture teams • Led integration of new communication signals for ADAS Domain Controller

Jun 2020 - Dec 2020
System Development Engineer – ADAS L2++ Programs

Perception Algorithm Engineer @ HiRain Technologies

• Developed TopView system with multi-camera setup and calibration • Built deep learning pipeline for semantic segmentation • Designed DNN for free space detection and indoor localization • Created traffic light distance estimation algorithm • Integrated multi-object tracking systems

Jul 2018 - May 2020
Perception Algorithm Engineer

Graduate Research Assistant @ Beijing Advanced Innovation Center

• Developed online calibration for 9-DOF stereo vision system • Created CNN for UAV landing marker detection • Designed multi-modal sensor fusion system for autonomous vehicles

Sep 2016 - Jun 2018
Graduate Research Assistant

Research Engineer @ Virtual Reality & Driving Simulation Lab

• Developed 6DOF SUV driving simulator with real-time rendering • Integrated VR system with motion platform for high-fidelity simulation

Oct 2015 - Jul 2016
Research Engineer

Adaptive Strategic Execution Program @ Duke University

Hybrid program focusing on strategic execution in technology leadership

Sep 2022 - Jul 2023

Self Driving Car Specialization @ University of Toronto

Online specialization in autonomous driving systems and technology

Jul 2020 - Sep 2020
